text: (atarku) avarkal"su'aipe! Nankal enkal mutataiyar vanankiya teyvankalai vittu vitumarum, nankal enkal porutkalai enkal viruppappatic celavu ceyvatai vittuvitumarum um'mutaiya (markkat) tolukaiya um'mai evukiratu? Niccayamaka nir kirupaiyullavarum nermaiyanavarum tan" enru (elanamaka) kurinarkal
